body:
The Sage Cell Server provides a [Sage](http://sagemath.org) computation web service. The [documentation](http://sage.math.washington.edu/home/jason/sagecell/) gives instructions for setting up your own server, or you can use the flagship server at [aleph.sagemath.org](http://aleph.sagemath.org). You can easily [embed](http://sage.math.washington.edu/home/jason/sagecell/embedding.html) Sage into any webpage. Here is a short example: ``` Sage Cell Server

Embedded Sage Cells

Factorial

Click the "Activate" button below to calculate factorials.

Your own computation

Type your own Sage computation below and click “Evaluate”.
``` The Sage Cell Server is based upon work supported by the National Science Foundation (DUE-1022574). Any opinions, findings, and conclusions or recommendations expressed in this material are those of the author(s) and do not necessarily reflect the views of the National Science Foundation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Sage Cell Server
